website_summaries.verdict: This best-selling immunity and brain booster harnesses the power of 3 different species of mushrooms, combined to create an organic gluten-free and vegan-friendly supplement.
pros: Tested for purity by a third party
Users report feeling more energized and focused, while memory function seems to improve and inflammation decreases
Capsules are easy to swallow and don't have a weird aftertaste
cons: Make sure to take capsule 20 minutes before eating
may cause side effects such as headaches without food

customer_reviews.title: Happy Healthy Calm
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this stuff about the time I started to feel like I was getting the awful crud that's going around. It immediately nipped it in the bud. I have also noticed a more calming and happy effect throughout the day. Which means less anxiety and less pharma meds. Win Win
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Healthy mindset
customer_reviews.text: This product has help me feel calmer and more alert. I've notice changes in my thought patterns. I gave this product a try to focus.
customer_reviews.author: Nandy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: 3 very clear improvements in my health
customer_reviews.text: Trying this product for the first time, I experienced 3 very clear improvements in my health. A huge improvement in inflammation. A definite boost in mental clarity and overall focus. But the biggest benefit I noticed and the one I most appreciate is increased energy that sustains me throughout the day and well into the evening. Very impressed with this product and definitely will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Buyer

customer_reviews.title: best supplement to take
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the genius brand and it’s transparency with how it’s produced.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about the consistency of this product. The picture above is from two different bottles, both from amazon. They are completely different colors, and apparently the same ingredients. Highly suspect that the caps are what they say they are. Puts the integrity of the product to question.
customer_reviews.author: samantha calkins

customer_reviews.title: liver rejected it
customer_reviews.text: Cant give it a good review because it effected my liver, my liver started shutting down and I ended up in hospital for two days. For som e reason my liver rejected my supplements I was taking and my doctor had me stop taking everything. Especially anything with mushrooms n it. Very scary and cost me over 20,000.00 in life support IV s and other test.
customer_reviews.author: ralph wells

customer_reviews.title: Easy & convienent way to stay healthy, have mental clarity, and clean focused energy.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pills. I wasn’t very aware of these mushroom supplements until Genius dropped their “Genius Mushrooms” I love all their other products so much I thought I’d give it a go and man do I love them! I feel more focused, energized, and have mental clarity through out the day. My days are amor more organized and I have more motivation to keep it that way and do the necessary things day in and day out to make me a more healthier and BETTER individual. These are a MUST try.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: I take three every morning as i read it absorbs better than spacing it out-so I’ll stick with this way ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should implement mushrooms into their routine! I take three every morning as i read it absorbs better than spacing it out-so I’ll stick with this way unless i get better advice lol. I will buy another after i run out.
customer_reviews.author: michelle a

customer_reviews.title: Breath-taking wellbeing, Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Genius Mushrooms for a few weeks now and I have noticed the effects it has had on my health, and health on my life. Though it only recommends 1 capsule 3 times daily, as I am an oversized person (6'5 lifter). I've been taking 2 capsules with a full glass of water 30 minutes before my daily meditation. I have found that it truly does help you remain calm. Another benefit which comes from the Cordyceps is increased Oxygen Utilization. As I do deep breathing exercises during meditation, I have felt a prolonged sense of wellbeing after those. Also found that I can sustain a longer period of endurance exercises, or cardio, after regularly taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ignatenko

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have In Your Arsenal of Nootropics
customer_reviews.text: I switched over to the Genius Mushroom from a generic brand and noticed an immediate difference in my day to day overall quality of my sense of well being, energy, focus, and immense stress reliever. I'm constantly on the go, and a lot of the time slightly overwhelmed by my daily tasks, but this has been an awesome addition to my arsenal of nootropics and supplemented his, and is a daily go-to on AND off training days. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished the entire bottle, and didn't experience any noticeable difference. Had high hopes for this product considering all the positive reviews. However, these reviews here are incentivized with a free bottle, which I never actually received! Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie12

customer_reviews.title: Great for inflammation and focus!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed results soon after I started taking this supplement, but I wanted to wait until I had used it for longer before leaving a review. Over the last month I’ve noticed a decrease in inflammation overall since starting to take Genius Mushrooms. I also have noticed better focus at work! Definitely worth trying if you have chronic inflammation from exercise or otherwise. Great supplement!
customer_reviews.author: AK1985

customer_reviews.title: The best Shrooms!
customer_reviews.text: You CANNOT get better than this. I was so excited to see this supplement released by Genius. I’ve been looking for a really good mushroom supplement but have been finding that it’s hard to find a quality mushroom supplement. When I saw this product I knew it would be 100% true to its name/brand. This product is such a good deal at the price they sell it at. I love this product. It makes me feel amazing and I noticed the affects within a few days and they have continued.
customer_reviews.author: Crazyred444

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed. My memory has improved literally in less ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. My memory has improved literally in less than two weeks of using it. I'm able to focus on the task at hand with out swaying off and losing interest. I'll definitely be using this product as a stable in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not just lions mane
customer_reviews.text: It may be just me but after using this for a couple of weeks I honestly felt worse then when I started. Would constantly get headaches, have trouble with memory. Personaly they did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wakawaka

customer_reviews.title: Do the math
customer_reviews.text: When I received the Genius Mushroom supplements , I received a invite to receive a free bottle. I went on line , filled questions and was told I would hear from a rep. Nothing has been heard from them. The label on the bottle says take 1pill 3 times a day for a total of 500 mgs each of Reishi, Cordyseps and Lions Mane. The math alone doesn’t work. That means 1/3 of 500 mgs in each pill. Can that be possible? I have been taking 500 mgs of each Lions Mane, Cordyseps and Reishi separately for over a year now and bought Genius to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Quality Formulation
customer_reviews.text: Genius Mushrooms is a very high quality and well thought out formulation. Immediate and ongoing sense of well being. Less fatigue without side effects. Improves mood and, for me, I have fewer cravings for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would help me focus and I saw that this had some pretty decent reviews. I ordered and I took for for almost two weeks. It was the worst two weeks I've had in a long time. Constant headaches and migraines. I only get migraines every so often but this gave me two migraines in the two weeks that I took the product. I threw it out and decided it wasn't for me. I wouldn't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I am really feeling the effects of this genius mushroom supplement. I am remembering things that I'd normally freeze up on. I'd also remember what I need to get done without having to write it down. Things just immediately come to mind. Honestly, this supplement has been really effective in improving my memory and has exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Mshoneylove

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my supplements
customer_reviews.text: I have taken several different products and have loved them all so when I saw this I figured I would give it a try and Again another great product. I notice clarity in my head and they seem to calm my anxiety down a bit. Plus they are 100% vegan. these leave you feeling great all day
customer_reviews.author: geoff arvesen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flow of controlled energy through the day.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product. The Genius Mushroom is pure quality. I used to drink a lot of energy drinks to keep up with daily work, yeah I was wired but my thinking was not very clear. These mushrooms allowed me to control my energy and achieve flow states for much longer and on demand.
customer_reviews.author: Geovani

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel funny
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had high hopes for this product, but it fell far short of my expectations. I am a healthcare provider who works long hours and needs to function at a high cognitive level with patient interaction. I took it for a week before I started feeling different. I feel like it had an inverse effect on me, causing me to forget things and second guess myself. I became more anxious/nervous and felt like my cognition was off. I am trying to see if things change before I stop taking them and throw them out completely. Seems like a trustworthy brand though! Product just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Lions mane is the cats meow
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second bottle of genus mushroom. I am currently taking anatomy and physiology and I have read numerous studies on the lions mane mushroom. I believe my attention was improved and my ability to retain information was also improved. I had less brain fog if you will while studying
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good de-stress pill, ZERO cognitive help
customer_reviews.text: This did the exact opposite of for what I bought it. I attend university and, at my age, I need some focus and clarity with a bit of energy thrown in. This made me SLEEPY, period.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous by Choice

customer_reviews.title: Headaches and irritability
customer_reviews.text: These gave me a headache, made it harder to concentrate, and made me irritable. A couple of times, they made me feel high in an unpleasant way. I've taken lion's mane for years, so I'm familiar with those effects. This one, being a mix of mushrooms, didn't work for me. It felt as if the lions mane, cordyceps, and reishi were fighting against each other. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Medium Rare

customer_reviews.title: Some improvement- I did get Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I tried this mushroom supplement for memory and concentration. Maybe I should have chosen Genius Consciousness? I did notice a slight difference, nothing to write home about or purchase again. Not sure if it is supporting my liver, I will ask Alexa about that :) Immunity? I take several immune boosters so I cannot say this is keeping me healthy on its own. Mood and stress? I didnt notice any difference, I do notice a difference with CBD oil. IN conclusion, I will not be a repeat customer for this but am leaning to trying the Genius Consciousness. Just because I like the name and hey, maybe it will work and bring my Genius out :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Physical Stamina increased
customer_reviews.text: After 20 days I feel calmer emotionally with increased physical stamina. At first the product made me hyper emotional, causing me to burst into tears and snot out of nowhere with overwhelming sadness. Idk what that was about but I felt pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Elbert Whitlow

customer_reviews.title: Stomach bug in pill form
customer_reviews.text: This product absolutely wrecked my whole digestive system. I couldn't eat anything for days cause of these mushroom pills. If you want diarrhea for a week, then go ahead and buy these pills.
customer_reviews.author: chesly houser

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Good product, at first I felt a difference than I probably got used to and couldn’t tell. Their costumer service is absolutely great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin A. Vashisht

customer_reviews.title: Increased Energy
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what benefits mushrooms could provide, but I have been pleasantly surprised by this supplement. I have felt a sustained energy, not like a burst from a pre workout, but a steady feeling of alertness since starting these. I have also noticed an increase in my ability to stay focused on the task at hand at work.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand ! I've used the genius mushrooms for about 1 and a half months because I was only taking 2 a day. I bought another thing because I like it so much and I'm going to start taking 3 a day. I have noticed I have a lot more energy throughout the day and have not been taking naps around 5 pm like I would usually have to!
customer_reviews.author: Mdyjak

customer_reviews.title: HIVES, CONFUSION AND ANXIETY
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give this item zero stars. I have been taking it for a month that and I have started to feel confused and have broken out in hives. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: does not have any impact on your immunity
customer_reviews.text: The product does not produce any of the promised miracles, particularly in terms of giving a boost to your immunity. I am taking it for a month already in accordance on their suggested use, and within last two weeks already cannot get rid of the flu like virus. Keep sneezing and coughing, runny nose, "genius mushrooms" failed to make my body resistant. I bought two bottles of this product and want to return the seller the second bottle, which I never opened.
customer_reviews.author: Lyudmyla Bliznyuk

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it rate below 1 star, I would
customer_reviews.text: Used product for over 2 weeks, to see if it improved my memory and focus. Gave me bad headaches for the entire day. I do not recommend. The reviews are positive only because they offer a free product. I think the reviews are fake due-to free product gimmick, or It just didn't work on me. No overall improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Medelin G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for highly active individuals.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely suggest for anyone with an active lifestyle. Whether you do a sport or just on your feet constantly moving this products for you. I used to use powder in my shakes but it tasted not so delicious. Taking the product like this is easy and you receive the benefits without earthy dirt taste.
customer_reviews.author: Slick Nic Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first, probably would have worked better if I took the full dose.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Genius Mushrooms for about 2 weeks now. At first, I noticed a big improvement in mood and energy. That faded after 4-5 days. I realized today that I should have been taking 3 pills per serving, and not 1. My review is a 4 for now, but after a week on 3 pills per serving, I'll come back and update it if necessary. Oh, and they do offer a free bottle when you leave a review of any type, good or bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice clarity and boost of motivation
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because i wanted some help focusing. I’m starting classes and a little extra focus while studying would help. First of it arrived on time, and the packaging is very nice. Just looking at the bottle it gives you confidence you purchased something of quality. Price point wise it is about the same as all the other supplements that are geard toward memory, focus, and clarity. The capsules are relatively small and easy to swallow and don’t have a bad smell. I can tell a slight difference in sharpness after taking. It’s almost like caffeine but with no jitters and a straight forward focus. I’m pleased and would buy again. If anything changes I’ll let you know!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Holt

customer_reviews.title: I’m a genius!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Genius Mushrooms for about a month now and I am so impressed that I plan to order another bottle. Right away I felt like I was using a higher percentage of my brain (the irony of that statement is intentional). I’m able to focus, think more clearly, and my memory has improved. My friends and family noticed this positive cognitive change as well. I would absolutely recommend this product and I’m personally interested in trying other products from this manufacturer. I just ordered the Genius Electrolyte powder. Works for me! Hope it works for you too!
customer_reviews.author: natale

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a continued boost of energy and focus without any jitters or drop off that might be experienced with caffeine based products. Remember to take this at least 20 minutes before a meal on an empty stomach for best results. I would recommend that you try this before breakfast and lunch first, in other words twice in a day to see how you react. Taking in the evening may keep you up later than you want.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Anxiety and mental fog
customer_reviews.text: This product has a high quality blend. I suffer from anxiety and often have a mental fog. I was skeptical at first but after using it for two months straight, my supply ran out for about a week and a half before I decided to get my next bottle. I didn’t think much of it bc I stack it with other supplements and thought that the others should suffice and that I’d get the Genius Mushrooms eventually. I ended up feeling totally different, much less clear in my head and less able to handle certain feelings and thoughts. So, It definitely wasn’t merely a placebo effect for me. We’re all different. Try it. It might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand name of mushroom supplements but decided to give these a try due to the fact that they are cheaper and grown here in the United States. At least, this is what they claim on their website. I have been using this product for about 6 weeks now and have no complaints. This Genius Company has quite a few health supplements on the market as well. They also seem to have fairly high ratings from what I am reading. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JimTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Trust the Shrooms
customer_reviews.text: Super product here. Cordycep user long time and the addition of the two other super mushrooms helps me power through my morning session! True to the name genius this product is dosed right for me. I take three capsules first thing in the morning and have the energy and focus to jet through my day. You need to take mushrooms everyday at consistent levels to feel the effects as it accumulates in the body to help protect disease and this is a great start to effectively increasing your take!
customer_reviews.author: austin1666

customer_reviews.title: Magic capsules
customer_reviews.text: Currently, I have been using the genius mushrooms for about 3 weeks. I am a BSN student, who has an addiction to caffeine. These magic capsules have given me the energy to almost eliminate caffeine. I just received the sleep aid product by this brand and I’m super excited to see how it works. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Great for ADD
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for nearly a month and I notice an improvement in my ADD when I take it in the AM. I am focused and get much more done than I usually do. No noticed side effects. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferB.isMe

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try Genius Mushroom because as a triathlete, I wanted to see if the latest hype of benefits of Reishi mushroom was warranted. I've been taking it now for about 4 weeks and can say I've noticed a substantial difference in my power output on my road bike. During runs, my heart rate seems to have decreased during maximum effort sessions. I will definitely continue taking Genius Mushroom. Highly recommend for any endurance athlete!
customer_reviews.author: alex Magdaleno

customer_reviews.title: No bueno, gross
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the actual effects of the product, but it has the most disgusting after taste and causes nasty burping and gas. I will not use as all I can think about it the taste of nasty flavored mushrooms... it ruined my sense of taste and enjoyment of food.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Buy "Host Defense Lion's Mane" Instead!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased "Host Defense Lion's Mane" and it works much better. Would give this product zero stars, if possible!!
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for mental focus, clarity and stress free day!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different products containing Lion's Mane, and love their cognitive enhancing benefits. This product takes it to the next level by including Cordyceps and Reishi. I take this in the morning with my coffee, and by the time I get into the office I am so focused and ready to take on the day! I have a somewhat stressful job, but I feel like I am so much better equipped to face any obstacles that come my way! Will continue to buy this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: At this time can recognize just a good experience using that product
customer_reviews.text: Use Genous Mashrooms product for a week now. At this time can recognize just a good experience using that product. Staying more focused for a longer time, body cleaning itself, feel much better physical and mental condition. Highly recommend everyone to try the Genious products which I can describe as the most natural supplement in the market now. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Darya

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice much of an energy boost or increased mental focus. Could be a good product but it didn't seem to do anything. Just my 2c
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johnson

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!! These really really work. I feel AMAZING!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much. These supplements are working very well for me and my body. I will definitely be ordering more. Fast shipping, great product and a great price. I highly recommend to anyone that wants to be in a great mood all day long!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Denise

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not an extract
customer_reviews.text: The mushrooms powder appears to be good quality but it is not an extract as the decription says it is. To me this is lying plain and simple. I bought this product because I wanted a concentrated mushroom extract as I was led to believe in the decription that it was. Powdered herbs are just not very potent and usually have very limited success. An extract is often darker in color as I read this product used to be. I am sorry. but I feel cheated and misled.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to help with immunity
customer_reviews.text: I bought Genius Mushrooms to help with immunity over the cold & flu season and to hopefully get a bit of a mental boost while I'm trying to cut down on caffeine. I take them in the morning with Alpha GPC & L-tyrosine as my own sort of nootropic blend, and if I remember I'll take one again in the afternoon but I usually forget. My entire office has been out sick and I managed to stay healthy, so that's a huge plus, and I haven't felt that familiar brain fog feeling that usually comes from lack of caffeine. Not sure if it's due to the Genius Mushrooms alone but I'll definitely keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No weird fillers, legit sourcing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I'll ever hit 'genius' level, mushrooms or no mushrooms, but the emerging science supports the cognitive benefits, and an ancient history of traditional uses indicate they certainly can't hurt. This product has no weird non-food stuff in it, and I feel good. Enough evidence for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My body loves these mushrooms 😊 I've felt great, less winter depression also
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life and addiction to coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this past 3 months to help my memory and to get through the clinical lab science program, and so far it’s helping me stay awake, healthy, and energized without coffee. Also my memory is sharper.. I recall information faster and clearer. I take at least 2 pills a day. 1 for breakfast and 1 during dinner. This seems optimal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product once again from Genius
customer_reviews.text: Love the combination of nootropic/immune booster/anxiety lowering effects from this product. I'm a 27yr old guy who does deal with social anxiety at times. This product helps lower the threshold of stress involved with that. The Lions Mane is best of both worlds for focus without jitters. Immune support keeps me in the game and not on the sidelines which at the end of the day is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Results
customer_reviews.text: I took it for about 30 days, it actually made me more irritated, didn’t feel any results. I bout this product based on the reviews, apparently they give you a free bottle if you write a good review.
customer_reviews.author: giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Skin gets very flush / Shortness of Breath
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop taking it, heartbeat increased drastically right after ingesting @ 4 days into the cycle. Throat felt tight and I followed directions to the T, and had heard great reviews on Lions Mane and Cordyceps. Unfortunately it wasnt for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler VonOsinski

customer_reviews.title: Good for immune system
customer_reviews.text: Taking this along with other adaptogens to strengthen my immune system during the winter month. I take public transportation for commuting and so far I haven't gotten sick yet. It seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: LahrasBoutique

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with these.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a little weary about ordering supplements from new companies, but have been impressed with Genius products. So far so good. Hopefully they keep the quality up.
customer_reviews.author: CraigAZ123

customer_reviews.title: Helps with mental clarity
customer_reviews.text: A whole new world was opened up to me regarding the medicinal properties of mushrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mushroom product because I was struggling with energy. At the time I was a full time student, employee and mother only getting about four hours of sleep a night in order to get all my tasks and studying done. To say the least I was exhausted and looking for a supplement to help my energy and focus. These pills were the answer! I was able to stay up late studying and still maintain my focus despite the sleep deprivation. I would highly recommend these to everyone, as I am sure a majority of people are always on the go and have busy days like mine. Lifesavers! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: I take one every morning!
customer_reviews.text: I take one every morning and usually another halfway through the day. I also have the Genius Electrolyte Powder but have a hard time drinking as I am not a fan of orange flavoring. Besides that I am still a fan of Genius brand products!
customer_reviews.author: LilWelderMama

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Product
customer_reviews.text: Genius Mushrooms has truly helped me with my memory and ability to focus. I'm losing items less frequently and able to sustain my train of thought. Even misplaced words are coming back to me more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: These seem to help
customer_reviews.text: I have a mentally demanding job and these seem to help me focus. I also believe there are immune benefits. I really need mental clarity during the day and these seem to help.
customer_reviews.author: Mopo

customer_reviews.title: Stay Focused
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this product regularly for a little over a month, and have noticed slight improvement in my thought processes during work. I only need one drink of coffee where I had needed two or three to stay focused. I'll probably need to take it for a couple more months to see if it really works for me, but so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I feel smarter
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Genius Mushrooms for about 15 days and have noticed an overall difference in my mental abilities. My thinking is sharper and clearer. I'm able to make connections and put thoughts together with ease. My recall has improved. I FEEL smarter!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Subtle at first but it really does improve memory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if it would have any effect on me and it did. It was subtle at first but I noticed I could recall dreams and memories better around the 2 week mark of taking 3 pills a day. Also noticed an increase in energy and short term memory in the mornings before work when I'm usually sluggish and forgetful. I would recomend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Clear mind
customer_reviews.text: I take this product with my breakfast in the morning because I can’t keep any pill down without food (I tried it twice with this supplement and wasn’t successful either time). It clears my mind and gives me energy before I even have my cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking lions main for a while now. I didn't find this product to be exceptional, especially for the price. I will get individual supplements for each mushroom in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: genius mushroom
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed genius mushroom product as a study aid while studying for my board exam. Great to take before exercise as well! Great blend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love that their products are third party tested it indicates towards the consumer that the claims they make about purity quality and doses are all confirmed and that we're not just taking their word for it. Second no fillers prop. blends etc is huge in today's industry considering my concern is weeding out which brands don't have their product filled with unnecessary / unbeneficial shit. Breath of fresh air. Lastly the convenience of having it delivered to your doorstep two days later by amazon is all but tooo convenient. Lastly non placebo driven results which is reassuring that my dollars aren't being spent on bunk. Feels' good ultimately you get what you pay for. Quality brand overall
customer_reviews.author: Moseph

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is good
customer_reviews.text: I had one bottle recently and it seemed to increased my energy levels and help me to think more clearly. I just got another bottle after trying another brand with 2 of the same mushrooms, but that brand didn't seem to do much and have the same quality in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: handy shrooms
customer_reviews.text: These are great especially for the days when I don't feel like having coffee (where I usually put my powdered Lions main) I can just pop three of these throughout the day. Very easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Danna Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement in memory
customer_reviews.text: Taking genius mushrooms made a noticeable difference in my mental function. Primarily what I noticed after about a week was that I could remember what I was doing once I left one room and went into another. Decreased threshold effect! I'm much more productive when I can remember what the hell I was doing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Experimenting with small stack
customer_reviews.text: Stacking with Centrophenoxine. Slows me down and I pay much more attention to details.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton

customer_reviews.title: I am posting this to get free product
customer_reviews.text: I'm posting this because I have to in order to get a free product, which is to just boost the amazon rating. I think this is a stupid requirement. I do however think that this product is high quality. If I could actually rate it the way that I want, I would give it four stars instead of five, only because I am being forced to write this review. I think that this is unethical of this company but I am complying because I am broke and cannot pass up free stuff. In the future I will buy a product from a more honest company.
customer_reviews.author: michelle mullenix

customer_reviews.title: Really noticed an increased energy level with this. Not ...
customer_reviews.text: Really noticed an increased energy level with this. Not in a stimulant way, but an overall sense of well being, less getting dragged down. I was skeptical but impressed with it and will continue to add it to my daily vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: The new 'magic' mushroom
customer_reviews.text: Genius Mushrooms is a phenomenal, natural supplement that helps improve my focus. I take one of these before I work on my homework and the change is very subtle but noticeable. I get less distracted which means I can work far more effectively! I recommend it highly to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brant

customer_reviews.title: Focus-Energy-Immune System booster. Good quality and price - recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Genius Mushrooms blend has the 3 mushrooms I like for focus, energy and immune system health, and I can feel a difference. I've tried other brands, but like this one best due to the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Got My Memory Back
customer_reviews.text: I think I was starting to have memory issues from Doctor prescribed medications (I was told it was a common side-effect). The Genius Mushrooms seem to have helped. It may have just been me getting used to the meds, or the Genius Mushrooms, maybe, both - but I seem have gotten both short-term and long-term memory back. I won't stop taking them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Aerospacegeek

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work well, the price is reasonable especially for the average individual. Hopefully it will stay low or lower so I can continue to purchase it monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Sharp

customer_reviews.title: and what I see in this formulation is nothing short of amazing. This product has really helped benefit me from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really interesting product! I had to do some research on this one, and what I see in this formulation is nothing short of amazing. This product has really helped benefit me from a lot of different angles, and at this price point it’s a can’t miss product!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hemminger

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable improvements
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of consistent use, I can indeed say that Genius Mushrooms do improve mental performance (concentration, alertness). I had been experiencing a fair amount of stress at work and between this product and some L-Theanine I was able to function much better. I will buy Genius again in the future, starting with a bottle of Consciousness.
customer_reviews.author: Benny the Geek

customer_reviews.title: Mildly improved focus
customer_reviews.text: I felt the mushroom combination helped boost my immune system and I would say that it gently tilts the scales toward an increase in my ability to focus. I would typically take these in the morning and when I was doing it consistently it seemed like I was a bit more "up" for my day. Not a huge difference from normal, but enough to tell the difference. It's definitely worth trying if you haven't purchased these before.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Sustained and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Clean sustained Energy, enhanced senses, enhanced mood with less swings, really impressed by the shrooms and will purchase again and keep it going
customer_reviews.author: Polish Mama

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: i noticed a slight improvement in my mood and focus, nothing really great just barely noticeable, i think the product is a little pricey but overall not bad but i would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jred

customer_reviews.title: The Genius Mushrooms are amazing
customer_reviews.text: once you continue taking the mushrooms after about 2 weeks you start to realize that you remember things alot easier, you connect the dots with certain problems and find solutions alot quicker. Amazing product to start you off into the nootropics world. Highly reccomended
customer_reviews.author: Orie

customer_reviews.title: Becareful my heart pressure rised to 220/120 and heart pains and I'm a physical fit person.
customer_reviews.text: The three ingredients are not a good combination. Better off taking/testing 1 ingredient and seeing how your body reacts to it. Gave me a pain in my chest where the heart is. This product made my blood pressure rise to 220/120 that is a trip to the hospital for a physically unhealthy person. On the plus side if you don't mind dying from this product it will make you high and concentrate better.
customer_reviews.author: The Good Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Meditation-like clarity
customer_reviews.text: I usually meditate 20 minutes twice a day, but this product makes me feel as if I meditate for twice as long. If you meditate, you may know what I'm talking about. The clarity it brings you is pretty awesome. I've been noticing things I don't normally notice. This shouldn't be used as a substitute for meditation/mindfulness, but it certainly helps.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: What really made me choose the Genius Brand was the fact that they advertise the concept of No proprietary blends, No artificial dyes, and No banned substances. These are important things to consider when ingesting products into your body, you want to make sure they are tested by a third party and know the info behind those results!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Baker

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Almost done with my first bottle of Genius mushrooms and I can say it has made a positive impact on my life. As a busy college student, it was extremely hard staying focused and awake during classes. After taking the genius mushrooms for weeks, I can genuinely say I have more energy and have the ability to focus more during lectures. It's pretty subtle guys so don't be expecting some crazy adderall-like effects. But overall I'm quite satisfied with this product and this brand overall. I'm definitely gonna try out more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Tablang

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: As a user of Onnit's Shroom Tech Sport I tried this as a cheaper alternative and ended up liking it. It doesn't have the full force punch that Onnits cordyceps blend has but with the extra mushrooms built in I have noticed a mental clarity akin to Onnit's Nu Mood supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Repeat order
customer_reviews.text: Combination of mushrooms was recommended, found increased alertness but not jittery like caffeine. Determined Can't take it before bed but am/early afternoon is good. Second bottle ordered so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't cause mushrooms to sprout from various orifices.
customer_reviews.text: Clean-looking, well packaged product. No obvious sensations when taken. I have a job that requires a great deal of physical and mental stamina, as well as exposure to infectious disease. While I can't say for sure whether this product has really helped me or not, I've been really killing it at work while a couple of my co-workers have been out sick.
customer_reviews.author: B-man

customer_reviews.title: Mental Clarity + Clean Energy
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me and I was intrigued to purchase it as I am a full-time student in college and have a full-time job. I needed something to help keep my energy and focus during long days. This product has boosted my mental clarity, helped suppress brain fog, and gave me energy to keep me going throughout the day. Can't wait to try out more supplements in this brand
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Genius capsules
customer_reviews.text: I like taking mushrooms in capsules so much easier than powders. Lionsmane add a boost to clarity. The combination has a noticeable benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for memory
customer_reviews.text: This definitely improved my memory, so it worked as promised. It made me a bit sleepy though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Love Genius Mushrooms!
customer_reviews.text: Love Genius Mushrooms! I have noticed a difference in my brain function and overall immune system. Only pros for this supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

product_meta.title: Genius Mushroom – Lions Mane, Cordyceps and Reishi – Immune System Booster & Nootropic Brain Supplement – Wellness Formula for Natural Energy, Stress Relief, Memory & Liver Support, 90 Veggie Pills
feature_bullets: NURTURE YOUR MIND, BODY & SPIRIT – By combining 3 of the most researched mycological species on the planet, Genius Mushrooms deliver an organic wellness formula unlike any other: Enhance mental clarity, immune function, natural energy and more

IMMUNE SYSTEM BOOSTER – Elevate immune support to another level with reishi mushroom extract: Having been used for centuries, this immune booster is what you need daily to stay healthy and avoid the common cold

MEMORY, FOCUS & COGNITIVE PERFORMANCE – Lions Mane provides a safe alternative to highly questionable nootropics and smart drug hitting the market nowadays: This species is a proven brain booster, great for work & studying

CAFFEINE FREE ENERGY SUPPLEMENT – Elevate your energy levels naturally via ATP production with Cordyceps Sinensis: Increase oxygen utilization, aerobic capacity and athletic endurance without stimulants

STRESS RELIEF, LIVER SUPPORT & DETOX – Reishi has also been shown to improve mood and to potentially act as a detoxifying liver cleanse: There isn’t another wellness formula on the market that delivers like this (Packaging may slightly vary).
